body.name: Shintenchi Over The Toilet Storage Cabinet, Bathroom Shelf Organizer with Anti-Tip Device Small Freestanding Space Saver with Adjustable Shelf and Glass Door, White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 9 hrs 16 mins
features: Bring A Tidy Bathroom: Comes with 1 open shelf and 1 cabinet with doors, the organeizer will bring you more storage options to store your various bathroom supplies without taking up too much space
Custom Adjustable Shelf: The shelf in the cabinet can be adjuated to different height according to your various storage needs. Also you can remove the inside shelf to store large size supplies

Stable and Stylish: Made by selected engineered boards, this shelf is sturdy for long time of use. An anti-tip device is included to increase the safty. Also the classic solid color design make it never time out and will suitable for most decor styles!
Multi-functional: Not only being an over the toilet storage organizer, you can also put it above the washing machine in your laundry, or even put in your entrance to store mess

Easy to Assemble and Clean: An detailed step-by-step manual is included on each box, you will get a new storage organizer in very soon time. Jut spend little time and wipe dust can mantain it being clean
body.description: Are you always troubled with the messy bathroom, toilet paper anywhere, no where to put your make up, barthroom always look so dirty...... Our Shintenchi over the toilet storage organizer can solve your worries perfectly! With 1 cabinet with doors and shelves, there would be infinite possibilities of storage. You can put your bathroom supplies in to the cabinet and shelvs without taking too much space. It is perfect for small apartment. The adjustable shelves are equipped for your different storage needs. And the organizer is never only an over the toilet storage. You can put it in your laundry room, entrance , living room or any others. Made by selected engineered boards, this shelf is sturdy for long time of use. An anti-tip device is included to increase the safty. Also the classic solid color design make it never time out and will suitable for most decor styles! The assembly process of this sturdy piece is completed with simple step-by-step instruction.Just wipe dust can easily keep it clean. Don't hesitate to bring it your home!

productInformation.value: #10,711 in Home & Kitchen (See Top 100 in Home & Kitchen) #5 in Over-the-Toilet Storage

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid, quality unit
reviews.reviewText: Looks really great in my bathroom! Nice color of medium grey, very handsome simple lines, lots of storage room. Really changed the cluttered look in the area. Despite some review last to the contrary, I found assembly instructions to be easy to understand and accurate. I did end up with extra hardware but it was clearly included as extra; I felt more confident about that due to another person’s review noting the same, so thanks to that person! This thing does need to be secured to the wall, as it will tip when you open the magnetic doors if you don’t. But the included hardware did the job and all is well. Makes me smile every time I see it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good enough - definitely not GREAT
reviews.reviewText: It's about what I expected. Not too sturdy, pretty basic to assemble and works for what I bought it for. Not the best quality, but looks decent in the bathroom. I found that I HAD to anchor it to the wall, because without being anchored, it's way too unstable/wobbly. Overall, I'm satisfied with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product was very flimsy. The bar at the bottom was awkwardly placed. I would not purchase anything else from this seller.Update- the seller reached out to help me with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The construction takes a little bit of time, but it's not difficult. The instructions are pretty clear.The anchor screws are useless, so I recommend getting your own.Besides that, it's sturdy, elegant, and can hold a lot of stuff.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Looks good but poorly designed
reviews.reviewText: As you can see from the photo it looks ok but it has problems. First the directions consist only of pictures and some of the parts look the same. Half way through the the assembly I was able to find very small tags on the end of parts. Next the brace on the bottom was too low to fit over the plumbing so I had to Jerry rig it see the second picture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great storage, but very wobbly and instructions are not very practical
reviews.reviewText: This cabinet provides a lot of much needed storage for my tiny bathroom, but it is extremely wobbly and the instructions don’t consider the fact you have to build it around a toilet. My recommendation is to read the instructions thoroughly before assembling and figure out what you need to build first so that you can install it around the toilet. Note that there’s a step on the last page to secure the backing that is very difficult to do once the shelf is on the toilet. Once built, I was able to store a lot of items in here but it is still very wobbly and I am not able to secure it to the wall since I live in a rental. Additionally as I have molding around the floor of my bathroom, it cannot rest flush against the wall. IKEA shelves usually have a cutout back there for this, but this one did not.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for small bathroom
reviews.reviewText: It was good quality and easy to assemble. I had to put the bottom part around the toilet then put the top part into the bottom part because it was too tall to just slid it down over the toilet. The only disadvantage is you cannot open the top of the toilet to fix something inside the tank, unless you disassemble the top part off the bottom part, which is not easy to do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth it
reviews.reviewText: Came early, good price but that’s it… Directions were not helpful, extremely difficult to put together because parts were mislabeled and it it’s definitely not high quality. Didn’t list the measurements for the bottom back so it was too big to fit into our bathroom. Will have to un-assembled then re-assemble the bottom later in the bathroom!Wish I wouldn’t have purchased this. Hopefully you have more luck!
